solution_line_template: Every day Zainab passes out flyers, she earns ${hourly_rate} x {hours_per_day} = $<<{hourly_rate}*{hours_per_day}={earnings_per_day}>>{earnings_per_day}
If she hands out flyers for {days_per_week} days, she'll earn ${earnings_per_day}/day * {days_per_week} days = $<<{earnings_per_day}*{days_per_week}={earnings_per_week}>>{earnings_per_week}
If she passes out flyers for {num_weeks} weeks, she will earn ${earnings_per_week} * {num_weeks} = $<<{earnings_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings}
